alert.note: Alert for Cortland; Schuyler; Southern Cayuga; Tioga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:26PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Schuyler, southeastern Cayuga, northwestern Cortland, north central Tioga and Tompkins Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 526 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Genoa to near Alpine. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ithaca, Cortland, Newfield, Cayuga Heights, Lansing, Enfield, Danby, Homer, Caroline and Virgil. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 10 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central New York.

area.areaDesc: Cortland; Schuyler; Southern Cayuga; Tioga; Tompkins
